name: Taesup Moon
content: People Principal Investigator Taesup Moon Professor Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering College of Engineering Seoul National University (Currently on sabbatical at Stanford University ~ 08/2025.) Contact tsmoon at snu dot ac dot kr +82-2-880-7297 301-707, Gwanak-Ro 1, Gwanak-Gu, Seoul, 08826, KOREA Administrative Assistant: Hayoung lee Education PhD, Department of Electrical Engineering, Stanford University (2008) MS, Department of Electrical Engineering, Stanford University (2004) BS, Department of Electrical Engineering, Seoul National University (2002) Work Experience Professor, Department of ECE, SNU (2024.9~Present) Associate Professor, Department of ECE, SNU (2021.3~2024.8) Visiting Professor, SEAS, Harvard University (2019.12~2020.8) Assistant/Associate Professor, College of ICE, SKKU (2017.3~2021.2) Assistant Professor, Department of ICE, DGIST (2015.9~2017.2) Research Staff Member, SAIT (2013.9~2015.8) Postdoctoral Researcher, Department of Statistics, UC Berkeley (2012.2~2013.8) Scientist, Yahoo! Labs (2008.10~2012.1) Other SNU Affiliations Interdisciplinary Program in AI at Seoul National University (IPAI) Artificial Intelligence Institute at Seoul National University (AIIS) Automation and Systems Research Institute (ASRI) Institute of New Media and Communications (INMC) Professional Services IEEE Senior Member (2024 ~ Present) Area Chair - ICLR 2024-2025, CVPR 2024-2025 Reviewer / Program Committee - NeurIPS, ICML, ICLR, CVPR, AAAI, AISTATS, ISIT , IJCAI, etc. Workshop chair - RiTA (2017,2018), ACML (2019), ICML (2020) Collaborators / Co-authors Tsachy Weissman (Stanford University) Bin Yu (University of California at Berkeley) Alex Smola (Amazon AWS) Lihong Li (Amazon) Klaus-Robert MÃ¼ller (TU Berlin) Flavio P. Calmon (Harvard University) Young-Han Kim (UCSD / Gauss Labs) Honglak Lee (University of Michigan / LG AI Research) Jianlong Fu (Microsoft Research Asia, Beijing) David Wipf (Amazon AI Research Lab Shanghai) Adrian Weller (University of Cambridge) Yang Liu (Emory University) Youngjoon Yoo (Naver CLOVA) Sanghyuk Chun (Naver AI Lab) Moontae Lee (University of Illinois Chicago / LG AI Research) Youngwook Kim (Sogang University) Choong Wan Woo (Sungkyunkwan University) Wonjong Rhee (Seoul National University) Sungroh Yoon (Seoul National University) Jangsup Moon (Seoul National University Hospital) Jae-Jin Song (Seoul National University Hospital) Changhwan Shin (Korea University) Jongduk Baek (Yonsei University)
